name: U.S. R&D expenditures, by performing sector and source of funds: 2010–20
description: U.S. R&D expenditures, by performing sector and source of funds: 2010–20

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: value
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of current and constant 2012 dollars

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Data are based on annual reports by performers, except for the nonprofit sector. Expenditure levels for higher education, federal government, and nonfederal government performers are calendar year approximations based on fiscal year data.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Patterns of R&D Resources (2019–20 edition).Science and Engineering Indicators
